markdown:
In "Silverstein - Bleed No More" the lyrics are sampling "You're the worst thing that ever happened to me" and I 100% thought this came from Dawson's Creek, but apparently it's from Fight Club. I might have mixed it up with "Too Bad You're Beautiful" by From Autumn To Ashes.

Anyway, all of this media was very formative for me ðŸ˜‹
